author: Michel Sapin
title: Visit by Michel Sapin to San Francisco Friday 6 and Saturday 7 January 2017
text:
MICHEL SAPIN 
FRENCH MINISTER FOR THE ECONOMY AND FINANCE 
 
N o t e  f o r  e d i t o r s  
N o t e  f o r  e d i t o r s  
 
www.economie.gouv.fr 
Paris, 29 December 2016 
@MichelSapin 
No. 073 
 
Visit by Michel Sapin to San Francisco 
on the theme of innovation and France as a place to do business 
 
Friday 6 and Saturday 7 January 2017 
 
 
 
Accompanied by Axelle Lemaire, French Minister for the Economy and Finance Michel Sapin will 
visit the CES in Las Vegas on 5 January 2017. He will then travel to San Francisco and Palo Alto 
on Friday 6 January 2017.  
 
He plans to meet with entrepreneurs, civil society representatives and elected officials to promote 
France as a place to do business. Minister Sapin will also discuss the opportunities and issues 
surrounding the digital economy. 
 
Provisional schedule: 
 
 
Friday 6 January 2017 
 
 
 
9–10.15am 
Meeting at Tesla and tour of facilities 
Location: 45500 Fremont Boulevard, Fremont 
 
 
 
11–11.45am 
Meeting with partners in Andreessen Horowitz 
Location: 2865 Sand Hill Road, Menlo Park 
 
 
 
3–3.45pm 
Meeting with Bob Reich, professor of public policy at the 
University of California at Berkeley and former Secretary of 
Labor   
Location: 2607 Hearst Avenue, Berkeley 
 
5–6pm 
Meeting with Edwin M. Lee, Mayor of San Francisco  
Location: San Francisco City Hall, 1 Dr. Carlton B. Goodlett Place, 
San Francisco 
 
Tour images. 
 

 
 
 
 
Saturday 7 January 2017 
 
8.30–9.30am 
Press breakfast  
Location: Palo Alto 
 
11am  
Brunch with French entrepreneurs and investors
